message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know you value time.
Let's split it evenly, Alice. That seems the fairest way to go about this.
I understand you want to split evenly, but time is money, Bob. This is my final offer.
Alice, let's compromise. I'm willing to take a smaller share if you'll meet me halfway. We can both get more than we would if we keep rejecting each other's offers.
